page.title: 14Arts
page.content: There are two places where{arts}are performed and exhibited, the{Village {Hall}and the{Priory.}There is also a permanent exhibition of old prints and paintings belonging to the{Duke of {Devonshire}in the{Devonshire Arms. In the Priory grounds sometimes there is a{pageant.}People dress up in costume and perform scenes from History or the Bible. There are{music concerts in the Priory Church and {Nativity Plays}at{Christmas. {The Drama Group}act a play each year in the Village Hall, and a{pantomime in the winter. The pantomime is written by local people.The children have their own Drama Group. The Drama Group hope to extend the Village Hall to hold a new stage. There is a Village Hall{Show}for flowers, paintings, baking, etc, in competitions.
